title: Feature Request - Ben.Demystifier for stacktraces
author: nmat
body_snippet:
https://github.com/benaadams/Ben.Demystifier seems interesting to have for stacktracing and making it easier to do error searching.

Its worth investigating to see how it would be implemented and if it might help to find the cause of problems easier.

iterations.description: Ben.Demystifier would improve stack trace readability in error logging across ~48 files, useful for support diagnostics but low priority nice-to-have.

notes:
AI triage (claude): Ben.Demystifier would improve stack trace readability in error logging across ~48 files, useful for support diagnostics but low priority nice-to-have.
